Room.Name: Ghelta's Secret Summoning Room
Room.ShortDescription: You have stumbled upon Ghelta's secret magical summoning room.
Room.LongDescription: Except for the light coming from the circle of half melted candles, the room is encased in total darkness. Even the light from your torches and your magical items seem ineffective against the darkness. Inside the circle of candles, mist rises from a pulsating crimson pentagram. You realize Ghelta was not unsuccessful in his attempts to summon creatures from other dimensions.
